name: Adia Beta
description: The Tholian Assembly have made their first major expansion into new territory with their claim to this region of the Origin Sector. This warrior race have been dormant for many years, biding their time to become a greater power in the Quadrant. The emergence of Progenitor ruins in this region gave them enough reason to advance, with their eye on getting any advantage they can against their age-old enemies, the Breen.
